sentences.en: A unanimous vote was taken to liquidate the company.
sentences.cn: 投票一致通过对这家公司进行清算。

sentences.en: National Helium Reserve to liquidate its helium assets by 2015 regardless of the market price.
sentences.cn: 无论市场价格，国家氦储备局将在2015年之前清算其氦资产。

sentences.en: The government tried to liquidate the rebel movement and failed.
sentences.cn: 政府试图肃清反叛运动，结果失败了。
